idea-plugin.name: XhCodeTools
idea-plugin.description:
Provides code generation support for the Xhsoft Java framework. This plugin helps developers working with the Xhsoft Java framework by automating the generation of boilerplate code. It ensures consistency with the framework's conventions and enhances development efficiency. Key features include:
  • Automatic generation of CRUD service and DAO classes based on entity definitions
星汉网络基础框架配套插件，目前功能：
  • 自动生成实体类对应的CRUD service和DAO类
